Submodules¶

apps_logging_app.main module¶

apps_logging_app.main.main()[source]¶

Main entry point for the application.

This function loads the configuration from base.yaml and agents.yaml, sets up the logging system, creates instances of the agents using the factory, and then enters an infinite loop to maintain the application in execution.

The application can be stopped by sending a SIGINT signal (e.g. using Ctrl+C in the terminal).

apps_logging_app.utils module¶

apps_logging_app.utils.get_file_id(path)[source]¶

Return a tuple of file identifiers for the given path.

On Linux/Darwin, the identifiers are the inode and device number. On Windows, the identifiers are the file size and creation time. On other systems, the identifiers are the file size and last modification time.

Parameters:

path (str) – the path to the file

Returns:

a tuple of file identifiers

Return type:

tuple
